name: refactor unit tests
description:
true unit tests: only test the *.units, test specific functions, minimal setup; if I have to mock out the database, then maybe I should redesign the functions, verify that everything works as intended, data is where and what it should be
integration/AC tests: setup up scenarios, make sure the api holds true; focus on the input and output, pay no attention to the inner data structures

unit tests will need to be modified every time the code is changed
AC tests should never ever change, unless the API changes and then it's kind of a big deal
